  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      run the application and present main menu

    • login

      public AccountOwner login(String username, String password)
      login with username and password if password is wrong, gives 3 more tries after 3 more wrong tries, the account is blocked for 30 minutes returns the logging account owner
      Parameters:
      username - the account owner username
      password - the account owner password
      Returns:
      the logged in account owner

    • checkRelease

      public boolean checkRelease(LocalDateTime release)
      check if release time has passed, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      release - the account release time
      Returns:
      true if release time has passed, false otherwise

    • blockAccount

      public void blockAccount(AccountOwner user)
      block account of user
      Parameters:
      user - the account owner to block their account

    • giveUser3TriesForPassword

      public boolean giveUser3TriesForPassword(AccountOwner user)
      gives user 3 tries to enter correct password
      Parameters:
      user - the account owner that is trying to log in
      Returns:
      true if user succeeds, false otherwise

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String givenPassword, String actualPassword)
      check equality of given password to the actual password
      Parameters:
      givenPassword - the password that the users enter
      actualPassword - the user's actual password
      Returns:
      true if passwords are equal, false otherwise

    • login

      public AccountOwner login(PhoneNumber phoneNum)
      login with phone number
      Parameters:
      phoneNum - given phone number
      Returns:
      the logging account owner, null if doesnt exist in the system

    • getOwnerByPhoneNum

      public static AccountOwner getOwnerByPhoneNum(PhoneNumber phoneNum)
      get account owner by phone number
      Parameters:
      phoneNum - the given phone number
      Returns:
      the account owner with the given phone number, null if there is no user with this number

      Returns:
